text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

I had my son Antonio on
March 29th, at 10:17 AM--
7 pounds, 4 ounces, 20 inches.
And he's fun right now.

You can definitely excel
at HBS while having
a family, especially as a mom.

You've just got to
know how to navigate.
I'm co-president of moMBA's.

I get to hang out with these
cool, exciting moms that
have a range of kids.
And we are thriving.

A year ago, we were able to
establish a maternity leave

policy and a parental leave
policy for the dads as well.

On top of that, we
were able to establish
the childcare scholarship.

I grew up in Brooklyn with my
mom Veronica and my stepdad

Manuel Antonio, who
unfortunately passed away
this year from COVID.
This has been my life.

I've always been
someone who's advocating

for racial justice or diversity
and equity and inclusion.

We just didn't
call it that then.

Moving forward as
business leaders,

I don't need to wait until
I'm in a high position.

There's plenty of work and
things that I can do now.

Mother's Day, it extends
to different people--

so the aunts, the
godparents, those who
stepped in as mother figures.

I want to say
Happy Mother's Day.
And enjoy this day.
